short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set a timer for YouTube usage and block access after time is up.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to set a timer for YouTube usage and block access after the time is up. It is designed to help you manage your viewing time and focus on what matters most.

I made it for myself when i waste too much time on Youtube.
